pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interpreted String Literals // An implementation of interpreted string literals, inspired by Python's Literal String Interpolation https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0498/ and Docstrings https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0257/ and Julia's Triple-Quoted String Literals https://docs.julialang.org/en/stable/manual/strings/#triple- quoted-string-literals.
